alert.note: Alert for Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 12 at 5:51AM EDT until March 13 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Queens and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 3 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. ROCKAWAY INLET NY NEAR FLOYD BENNETT FIELD NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.3 FT, MODERATE 8.3 FT, MAJOR 9.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/12 PM 5.9/ 6.4 0.2/ 0.8 1.4/ 1.9 2-3 NONE 13/01 AM 7.2/ 7.7 1.6/ 2.0 2.2/ 2.7 3 MINOR 13/01 PM 5.7/ 6.2 0.1/ 0.6 1.4/ 1.9 3 NONE 14/02 AM 7.4/ 7.9 1.8/ 2.2 2.5/ 3.0 3 MINOR 14/01 PM 4.9/ 5.4 -0.8/-0.2 0.8/ 1.3 3-4 NONE 15/02 AM 5.7/ 6.2 0.2/ 0.7 0.7/ 1.1 3 NONE JAMAICA BAY AT INWOOD NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
